76:1: hal  a-taa  a-lal  in-saa-ni  hee-num  mi-nad  dah-ri    lam  ya-kun  shai-am  maz-koo-raa

76:3: in-naa  ha-dai-naa-hus  sabee-la   im-maa  shaa-ki-ranw  waim-maa  ka-foo-ra

76:8: wayut-"i-moo-nat  taaa-ma    a-laa  hub-bihee  mis-kee-nanw  wayatee-manw  waasee-raa

76:10: in-naa  na-khaa-fu  mir  rab-bin-na  yaw-man  a-boo-san  qam-ta-ree-raa

76:13: mut-ta-kiee-na  fee-ha  a-lal  a-raaai-ki  laa  ya-raw-na  fee-haa  sham-sanw  wa-laa  za-mha-ree-raa

76:20: wai-zaa  raay-ta  sam-ma  raay-ta  naee-manw  wa-mul-kan  kabee-ra
76:21: aa-liya-hum  siyaa-bu  sun-du-sin  khud-runw  wais-tab-raq    wa-hul-looo  a-saa-wi-ra  min  fid-da-tinw  wa-sa-qaa-hum  rab-bu-hum  sha-raa-ban  ta-hoo-raa
76:22: in-naa  haa-zaa  kaa-na  la-kum  jaz-zanw  wa-kaa-na  sayu-kum  mas-hkoo-raa

76:24: fas-bir    li-huk-mi  rab-bi-ka  wa-laa  tu-ti  mi-nhum  aa-si-man  aw  ka-foo-raa
